comment.author: 46662109@N06
comment._content: Wow, I think this room was my kindergarten classroom (the sliding doors are the hint) when I was at PLC in the 1970s. I often wondered (when I should have been concentrating) about what my classrooms would have looked like when Ingelholme was a house.. Wish there was a photo of the magnificent wood panelled front hall.

comment._content: Hi  Friends , How are you ? spend my free time with family, friends, exploring new places, basket ball games, concerts, shows, watching movies, and traveling
